name: Mini Mage Arena
description:
Mini Mage Arena is a game for the 8x8 Jam, where every sprite and tile uses only 8px x 8px sprites.  The game is a magic, arena shooter where you survive as long as possible, as the slime menace takes over.

Xbox Controller Support:

LEFT STICK - Movement & Aiming

A BUTTON - Magic Attack

B BUTTON - Special Attack: Fire Ball 

START - Menu Navigation

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Movment & Aiming

J - Magic Attack

K - Special Attack: Fire Ball

Enter/Escape - Menu Navigation
